name: Z88 Oregon Trail
description:
I adapted the following version of the 1978 classic to work with the Cambridge Computers Z88 - Clive Sinclair's last computer. 

The game is written in the Z88 version of BBC basic. It does not use Mode1 graphics, and should run on any Z88, with any version of OZ.

https://github.com/topherPedersen/OregonTrail1978

The key changes I made...

  • Track your spending at the beginning of the game.
  • Formatting for an 8 line / 80 character display
  • Some use of z88 VDU codes
  • Altered shooting routine to work for the Z88
  • Removed most REM statements to save space

OZVM

If you don't have a Z88, you can emulate it with one with OZVM:

https://cambridgez88.jira.com/wiki/spaces/OZVM/overview
